settings.dual_heading-1: All your dog wants is to

settings.text: Contains the most effective joint supplement ingredients on the planet!

settings.title: Natural Ingredients​
settings.text: Packed with human-grade, natural ingredients to reduce joint pain and keep your dog happy and active​

settings.title: No Preservatives
settings.text: Contains only 6 powerful ingredients, all free from any potentially harmful inactive ingredients​

settings.title: Proven by Research
settings.text: Created with a patented blend of research-backed ingredients proven to alleviate joint pain and promote joint health in dogs

settings.title: Veterinarian Backed
settings.text: Developed by a veterinarian with over 40 years of experience, our formula meets the highest standards of safety and quality

settings.heading: The math has been done for you
settings.row_content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

settings.heading: Contains EXACTLY what the label says
settings.row_content: The product is guaranteed to contain exactly what the label says it contains. There is no governmental oversight or regulation ensuring quality control of supplements. One study found that 81% of randomly selected supplement products did not meet label claims, with some of the products containing 0% of the labeled ingredient ! It is important to choose a product from a reliable source, be confident of what is in the product, and consider evidence and facts, not just claims.

settings.heading: High-quality ingredients supported by research

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.custom_liquid:
<canvas id="bg"></canvas>
<script type="module">
import { GLTFLoader } from 'https://cdn.skypack.dev/three@0.133.1/examples/jsm/loaders/GLTFLoader.js';
const scene = new THREE.Scene();
// const camera = new THREE.OrthographicCamera( window.innerWidth / - 2250, window.innerWidth / 2250, window.innerHeight / 2250, window.innerHeight / -2250, -1, 100); 
// camera.zoom = window.innerWidth / 1480;
// scene.add( camera );
	
	
var w = window.innerWidth;
var h = window.innerHeight;
var viewSize = 1000;


const camera = new THREE.OrthographicCamera( w / (- 2 * viewSize), w / (2 * viewSize), h / (2 * viewSize), h / (- 2 * viewSize), -1, 100 );	
	camera.zoom = window.innerWidth / 1300;
	scene.add( camera );
	
var aspectRatio = window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight;
var originalAspect = window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight;
const canvas = document.getElementById('bg');
const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({
  canvas: canvas,
	alpha: true,
	antialias: true
});
renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);
renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
renderer.shadowMap.enabled = true;
renderer.shadowMap.type = THREE.PCFSoftShadowMap;
renderer.outputEncoding = THREE.sRGBEncoding;
camera.position.set(-.55,0,0);
camera.lookAt(0,0,0);
camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
renderer.render(scene,camera);
window.addEventListener( 'resize', onWindowResize);
function onWindowResize(){
    var aspect = window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight;
    var change = originalAspect / aspect;
    var newSize = viewSize * change;
    camera.left = -aspect * newSize / 2250;
    camera.right = aspect * newSize  / 2250;
    camera.top = newSize / 2250;
    camera.bottom = -newSize / 2250;
    camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
    renderer.setSize( window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight );
}
var rightLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.1);
rightLight.position.set(-50,0,50);
rightLight.target.position.set(0,0,0);
const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight( 0xffffff, 1 );
directionalLight.position.set(-1, 0, 0);
directionalLight.target.position.set(0,0,0);
directionalLight.castShadow = true;
scene.add( directionalLight );
const loader = new GLTFLoader();
	let product;
loader.load( 'https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0649/7524/1461/files/dr_gregory_product_final_new.glb?v=1690469865', function ( gltf ) {
	product = gltf.scene;
 	product.position.set(0,-.175,.3);
	scene.add( product );
}, undefined, function ( error ) {
	console.error( error );
} );
function animate() {
	renderer.render( scene, camera );
	if (product) {
	product.rotation.y -= .005;
	}
	requestAnimationFrame( animate );
}
animate();
</script>
